page.title: 07CUMBRIA POLICE H.Q. ADMIN.
page.content: Based at Carleton Hall,a former mansion with modern extensions.Force of 1150{officers,}including 76 women to maintain law and order.254civilians employed, 200 of them at headquarters. 185 special constables, 100{C.I.D officers, 120{traffic police,}6{dog {handlers and dogs.}No mounted police - borrow from neighbouring forces.{Cost {Â£27,211,000 annually. Control Room:}in touch with all police stations, terminals for information from Central Computer at Hendon. Warning telephone and siren for nuclear attack. {Re-training}facilities:lecture rooms, 40 bedrooms. Dog training, fire-arms range. Printing dept. for 500 different forms. Driving school. Canteen and social club.{Community {liaison}work mainly with young people for sport and outdoor activities & Duke of Edinburgh Award supervision.
